formErrorWritingFile: Error: Could not write your changes to the file. Please check if the todo.txt file exists and if you have sufficient permissions to write to it:
formInfoNoInput: Please add a todo into the text field. If you are unsure on how to do this, take a quick look at the todo.txt syntax.
addTodoContainerSubtitle: This list is empty, let's add some todos.
onboardingContainerSubtitle: Start either by choosing your existing todo.txt file or creating a new one.
windowTitleCreateFile: Choose a folder to save your todo.txt file
modalFileContent: There is already a todo.txt located at the chosen directory. Would you like to overwrite the existing todo.txt file (all contents will be lost) or select a different directory?
search: (A) Search by using the todo.txt syntax @context +project due:
noResultContainerSubtitle: No results found for either your search input nor your selected filters
